description:
Matsu (Sekirei #02) is a bespectacled Sekirei with genius-level computer and hacking skills. She utilizes a vast network of satellites and spying devices to gather large amounts of information, and once even succeeding in hacking the MBI`s mainframe computer.
Matsu refers to herself as the "Wisdom" Sekirei and uses the "-tan" suffix in everyone`s names. One of her favorite hobbies is watching the mayhem Minato and his other Sekirei cause every day. Matsu`s primary role is as Minato`s unofficial strategist, rarely venturing outside of the Inn and using her vast network of information to aid him.
Matsu has the power to access and analyze any electronic device on a telepathic level. Her name literally means "Pine".
name: Matsu
